overview: Examining the evolution of Valentine's Day from a heartfelt celebration of love into a commercial frenzy, the film uncovers the emotional and societal tolls, challenging viewers to rethink love, consumerism, and self-worth..
title: The 14th February and Beyond | Award Winning Film | Valentine's Day Film

overview:
The Flip Side explores the untold story of Asaram Bapu’s ashram during the turbulent period of the 2013 media-fueled trial. While the public narrative was dominated by sensational headlines that painted their guru as guilty before the courts could speak, the film turns its lens to the community of ashramites who found themselves at the center of a storm they never invited.

Rather than repeating the familiar frames of scandal and controversy, this story uncovers how disciples—who saw Asaram Bapu not just as a spiritual teacher but as a guardian of cultural and civilizational values—coped with the sudden dismantling of their world. Through their memories, struggles, and resilience, The Flip Side reveals a parallel truth: the emotional, spiritual, and social upheaval of a community caught between faith and a hostile media landscape.

At its heart, the film asks: what happens when an entire spiritual ecosystem is neutralized overnight—not by verdict, but by narrative?
title: The Flip Side | The truth that could not reach you
